nodes.bodyText: 5500 ms was used for V14 (which has no progress plugin), so I would not go below that. Any reason to assume it will be faster with V15 bootstrap?

Ah, hm.
I thought progress plugin has been used for any version.
But OK, I will revert that.
Just a note: this code never worked since:

Boolean.getBoolean("vaadin.useDeprecatedV14Bootstrapping") always returns false.
there is no any configuration which allow to run this test  using V14 bootsrtaping.
